Package skywaysolutions.app.rates

Class RateController

java.lang.Object
skywaysolutions.app.rates.RateController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRateAccessor, IRepairable
public class RateController extends Object implements IRateAccessor
This class provides a rate controller to access the rates.
Author:
Alfred Manville
